price: 78. Mpe botutu bwa ngai, bokozalaka likolo lia yo kino o mokolo mwa suka.
arabic: وَإِنَّ عَلَيۡكَ لَعۡنَتِيٓ إِلَىٰ يَوۡمِ ٱلدِّينِ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: wa-inna ʿalayka laʿnatī ilā yawmi al-dīni
